name: Lost Care - Breast Cancer
remarks: A very simple and incomplete module that defines a higher likelihood of mortality if breast cancer care is missed. Specifically, this module will check that SNOMED code 33195004 was "missed" and is in the lost-care health record using the "Lost Care" transition type. If the care was missed, the module will check yearly for whether the person should have a higher mortality rate. This module is not based in fact, a 67% yearly mortality rate for missed breast cancer care is made up.

This state uses the "Lost Care" transition to check if a person missed breast cancer care using the SNOMED code 33195004 (Teleradiotherapy procedure (procedure)). Although this is not breast cancer specific, Synthea only uses this code in the breast cancer modules.

codes.display: Death due to Uncovered and Unreceived Treatment

remarks: Note: This SNOMED Code (397709008) is just for death - not death from lack of treatment.
